titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Taiwanese-American Heritage Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 5/13/2004--Introduced. States that Congress: (1) declares that the warm relations and bilateral exchanges between the people of the United States and Taiwan should continue and grow deeper; and (2) supports the goals and ideals of Taiwanese American Heritage Week and recognizes the importance of Taiwanese-Americans to the United States.
